Biz API

​Brands

Endpoint:https://api-biz-stg.gotit.vn

Bộ các API để lấy danh sách các brand với thông tin liên quan đến brand. Từ đó client có thể hiển thị các brand một cách phù hợp cho người dùng lựa chọn.

​Get list of brands

GET
https://api-biz-stg.gotit.vn
/api/v4.0/brands

Retrieve a list of brands

​Get list of brands › Headers

  • X-GI-Authorizationstring · required

    Authorization

    Example: API key GotIt provided

​Get list of brands › Responses

    • statusstring

      HTTP response status

      Example: OK
    • statusCodeinteger

      HTTP response status codes

      Example: 200
    • errorstring

      Error code

    • messagestring

      Message Error

    • dataobject[]
GET /api/v4.0/brands

​Get brand detail

GET
https://api-biz-stg.gotit.vn
/api/v4.0/brands/{id}

Returns brand detail data master

​Get brand detail › path Parameters

  • idinteger · required

    Brand Id

    Example: 46

​Get brand detail › Headers

  • X-GI-Authorizationstring · required

    Authorization

    Example: API key GotIt provided

​Get brand detail › Responses

    • statusstring

      HTTP response status

      Example: OK
    • statusCodeinteger

      HTTP response status codes

      Example: 200
    • errorstring

      Error code

    • messagestring

      Message Error

    • dataobject[]
GET /api/v4.0/brands/{id}

​Get brand by product

GET
https://api-biz-stg.gotit.vn
/api/v4.0/brands/brandsByProducts

Returns brand detail data master

​Get brand by product › Headers

  • X-GI-Authorizationstring · required

    Authorization

    Example: API key GotIt provided

​Get brand by product › Responses

    • statusstring

      HTTP response status

      Example: OK
    • statusCodeinteger

      HTTP response status codes

      Example: 200
    • errorstring

      Error code

    • messagestring

      Message Error

    • dataobject[]
GET /api/v4.0/brands/brandsByProducts
